DOC.brief_summary: This study recruit driver Type 1 diabetes across U.S. assign four group base presumed risk level- routine care low risk , routine care high risk , one two Internet intervention focus reduce hypoglycemia driving . All subject follow two year determine whether intervention effective reduce hypoglycemia relate driving collision .
DOC.brief_title: Identifying Driving Risk Factors Type 1 Diabetes Their Reduction Via Internet Program ( DiabetesDriving.Com )
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator demonstrate driver Type 1 diabetes least twice many collision non-diabetic spouse , half driver Type 1 diabetes least one hypoglycemic driving mishap year , 5 % least six event year . However , point investigator accurately predict individual hypoglycemia drive mishap , one goal study . The investigator also demonstrate face-to-face behavioral intervention focus reduce occurrence hypoglycemia lead significantly few vehicular collision citation . The question arise whether behavioral intervention , specifically focus reduce hypoglycemia driving , effectively deliver internet . Participants first complete Interest form . This questionnaire use determine individual 's presume risk category ( high low risk ) . Research staff use risk category randomly assign participant one four group accord randomization scheme . The four group include : 1 ) Routine Care - low risk , 2 ) Routine Care - high risk , 3 ) DiabetesDriving.com ( DD.com ) participate Internet intervention , 4 ) DiabetesDriving.com + Motivational Interviewing ( MI ) subject receive Internet intervention two 60 minute MI session telephone . The MI session take place follow completion Internet intervention ( within 7 day ) . This interview focus make explicit individual ' ambivalence around change behavior . Individuals assign DD.com DD.com+MI group complete 6 Cores , class internet , focus risk factor prevention , detection , management hypoglycemia driving . Each core take approximately 30 minute complete . Core 0 tutorial use internet program . Core 1 focus use Tool Kit ; Core 2 focus safer driver general ; Core 3 focus prevent hypoglycemia occur driving ; Core 4 focus detect treat hypoglycemia drive ; Core 5 focus maintain improvement achieve previous Core next 12 month . After complete Core , individual must wait week start next Core . During time individual complete least three Daily Progress Notes , rate success achieve drive goal establish previous Core . The Cores take 8 week complete complete Driving Survey 2 . All participant complete Driving Surveys monthly drive diary . The first Driving Survey ( Driving Survey 0 ) available participant soon consent . Driving Surveys give 2 14 month submission Driving Survey 0 . Participants also complete monthly drive diary , report drive experience full previous month . Monthly drive diary available first day next full month 98 day ( 14 week ) complete Driving Survey month 2 continue 12 month . Twenty-six month submit Driving Survey 0 , participant email two year follow-up . They ask complete brief questionnaire driving outcome ( collision , citation , etc . ) .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Have diagnose Type 1 diabetes least one year 2 . Started take insulin less year diagnose Type 1 diabetes 3 . Measure blood glucose least twice day 4 . Legal valid driver 's license 5 . Drives great 5,000 per year 6 . Regular access Internet , either family computer another readily accessible computer 7 . Age 18 70 year 8 . English speaker 1 . Type 2 diabetes 2 . Does take insulin 3 . Does drive 4 . Does legal valid driver 's license 5 . Does routine access internet
